CMSAVS

Detailed Description

This is a sub-module which is part of the Connection Management System.

This module will handle allocation of Isoc channels and bandwidth from the IRM node. It also handles all settings related to AVS Transmitters. When this module is in use AVS functions changing state should not be called form elsewhere except the sample rate changes handled directly by DAL.
